burgers.menu_description: From plain single teir burgers to towering skyscrapers of meat we've got everything you could want in a simple collection of choices.

items.name: Semi-American Burger
items.description: A 50% American burger. A 100% angus beef burger with Swiss cheese.

items.name: The Quick Fill
items.description: Prized for being ready in under 3 minutes, this burger is made from scratch on order. Comes with lettuce, cheddar cheese, and ketchup.

items.name: The Tall Stack
items.description: Three 100% angus beef patties stacked on top of each other in the middle of a buttered bun. Comes with cheddar cheese, ketchup, lettuce, and dill pickle wedge

items.name: The Grand Order
items.description: A multi tiered burger with everything on it.

items.name: The Long Patty
items.description: A 100% angus beef burger prepared in a oblong tube rather than a patty. You may be tempted to call it a hot dog.

side-dishes.menu_description: Whether you're looking for a classic side or something new and original, we've got you covered.

items.name: Original Fries
items.description: A relative mountain of our fries seasoned to perfection in our originial seasoning.

items.name: Round Fries
items.description: A basket of our homemade onion rings seasoned to perfection in our original seasoning.

items.name: Nuggets
items.description: Why should nuggest be served as the main course when you can serve them on the side with everything?!

items.name: The Garden
items.description: A freshly prepared salad with lettuce, tomato, and spinich.

items.name: Green Fries
items.description: Our newest creation. Lightly seasoned kale chips perfect for the health focused.

desserts.menu_description: From fudge to chocolate tacos we've got something that will satisfy even the strongest sweet tooth.

items.name: The Choco

items.name: The Perfect Malt
items.description: Our self-awarded award winning malt shake. Comes in any combination of chocolate, strawberry, or vanilla flavors.
